description:
At Hernandez Law Group, P.C., in Amarillo, Texas, we know that recovering from a serious injury can be a long and arduous process, especially if the injury resulted from someone else's reckless or careless actions. Our attorneys are passionate about obtaining results, and they treat every client like they would treat members of their own family who are suffering from injuries or lost a loved one as a result of any of the following:

  • Motor vehicle accidents, including car, truck, motorcycle and pedestrian accidents
  • Construction, industrial, chemical plant, oilfield or other workplace accidents
  • Medical malpractice, nursing home abuse and birth injuries
  • Falls on dangerous property, animal attacks and negligent security
  • Products liability, including defective vehicles, drugs and medical devices
  • Injuries to victims of crimes, such as assault and battery, sexual abuse, and workplace crime

We understand how overwhelming it is to be in pain and be unable to work or carry on with your normal activities, all while facing mounting medical bills after an injury. You may also be dealing with the emotional aftermath of an accident that interferes with your sleep patterns and your relationships. The attorneys at our law firm want to make things right, and we are committed to helping you seek the justice and the maximum compensation you deserve.

We also handle U.S. immigration matters, including visas, green cards and naturalization, for those seeking new opportunities through these complex legal processes.

Contact the law office of Hernandez Law Group, P.C., to schedule a free consultation, either face-to-face or through virtual channels, to learn how our compassionate attorneys can assist you in pursuing the best possible outcome for your situation.
